description: Define dropdown filter UX for recurrence, category, and priority with defaults and responsive placement.

tasks.title: Define dropdown filter layout and placement
tasks.description: As a user, I want filter dropdowns placed consistently so I can narrow tasks quickly.
acceptanceCriteria: Place filters under search and above status tabs
Left-align on desktop and stack vertically on mobile
Use native select controls with consistent height
Apply focus ring: focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:ring-offset-2

tasks.title: Define recurrence filter options
tasks.description: As a user, I want recurrence options to quickly narrow recurring tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: Options: All (default), Recurring, Non-recurring, Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly

tasks.title: Define category and priority filter options
tasks.description: As a user, I want category and priority options to narrow by tags and urgency.
acceptanceCriteria: Category options: All (default), Uncategorized, then tag list sorted A→Z
If no tags, show only All and Uncategorized
Priority options: All (default), Low, Medium, High
